sqlMap.sql: ENTRUST_ID, CODE, NAME, STATUS, ENTRUSTOR_ID, WT_DATE, SJR, SJR_TEL, SJR_ZJ_TYPE, SJR_ZJ_CODE, MAJOR_CODE, JD_ORG, JD_FZR, JD_HISTORY, JD_REQUIRE, JD_COMPANY, REMARK, IS_CXJD, WT_ID_PARENT, BRIEF, INPUTOR, INPUT_DATE, ACCEPTOR, ACCEPT_DATE, IS_ACCEPT, NOT_ACCEPT_REASON, ND, JD_TARGET_ID,PROCESS_INST_ID
sqlMap.select: select SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID, SF_ENTRUST.CODE, SF_ENTRUST.NAME, SF_ENTRUST.STATUS, SF_ENTRUST.WT_DATE, SF_ENTRUST.SJR, SF_ENTRUST.SJR_TEL, SF_ENTRUST.SJR_ZJ_TYPE, SF_ENTRUST.SJR_ZJ_CODE, SF_ENTRUST.JD_ORG, SF_ENTRUST.JD_FZR, SF_ENTRUST.JD_HISTORY, SF_ENTRUST.JD_REQUIRE, SF_ENTRUST.JD_COMPANY, SF_ENTRUST.REMARK, SF_ENTRUST.IS_CXJD, SF_ENTRUST.WT_ID_PARENT, SF_ENTRUST.BRIEF, SF_ENTRUST.INPUTOR, SF_ENTRUST.INPUT_DATE, SF_ENTRUST.ACCEPTOR, SF_ENTRUST.ACCEPT_DATE, SF_ENTRUST.IS_ACCEPT, SF_ENTRUST.NOT_ACCEPT_REASON, SF_ENTRUST.ND, SF_ENTRUST.PROCESS_INST_ID, SF_ENTRUST.MAJOR_CODE, SF_ENTRUSTOR.ENTRUSTOR_ID, SF_ENTRUSTOR.CODE AS ENTRUSTOR_CODE, SF_ENTRUSTOR.NAME AS ENTRUSTOR_NAME, SF_ENTRUSTOR.ADDRESS AS ENTRUSTOR_ADDRESS, SF_ENTRUSTOR.ZIP AS ENTRUSTOR_ZIP, SF_ENTRUSTOR.LINK_MAN AS ENTRUSTOR_LINK_MAN, SF_ENTRUSTOR.LINK_TEL AS ENTRUSTOR_LINK_TEL, SF_JD_TARGET.NAME as JD_TARGET_NAME, SF_JD_TARGET.SEX as JD_TARGET_SEX, SF_JD_TARGET.AGE as JD_TARGET_AGE, SF_JD_TARGET.ID_NAME as JD_TARGET_ID_NAME, SF_JD_TARGET.ID_CODE as JD_TARGET_ID_CODE, SF_JD_TARGET.PHONE as JD_TARGET_PHONE, SF_JD_TARGET.ADDRESS as JD_TARGET_ADDRESS, SF_JD_TARGET.ZIP as JD_TARGET_ZIP, SF_JD_TARGET.JD_TARGET_ID from SF_ENTRUST, SF_ENTRUSTOR, SF_JD_TARGET WHERE SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUSTOR_ID = SF_ENTRUSTOR.ENTRUSTOR_ID AND SF_ENTRUST.JD_TARGET_ID = SF_JD_TARGET.JD_TARGET_ID(+) AND SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID = #entrustId:DECIMAL#

select SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID, SF_ENTRUST.CODE, SF_ENTRUST.NAME, SF_ENTRUST.STATUS, SF_ENTRUST.WT_DATE, SF_ENTRUST.SJR, SF_ENTRUST.SJR_TEL, SF_ENTRUST.SJR_ZJ_TYPE, SF_ENTRUST.SJR_ZJ_CODE, SF_ENTRUST.JD_ORG, SF_ENTRUST.JD_FZR, SF_ENTRUST.JD_HISTORY, SF_ENTRUST.JD_REQUIRE, SF_ENTRUST.JD_COMPANY, SF_ENTRUST.REMARK, SF_ENTRUST.IS_CXJD, SF_ENTRUST.WT_ID_PARENT, SF_ENTRUST.BRIEF, SF_ENTRUST.INPUTOR, SF_ENTRUST.INPUT_DATE, SF_ENTRUST.ACCEPTOR, SF_ENTRUST.ACCEPT_DATE, SF_ENTRUST.IS_ACCEPT, SF_ENTRUST.NOT_ACCEPT_REASON, SF_ENTRUST.ND, SF_ENTRUST.PROCESS_INST_ID, SF_ENTRUST.MAJOR_CODE, SF_ENTRUSTOR.ENTRUSTOR_ID, SF_ENTRUSTOR.CODE AS ENTRUSTOR_CODE, SF_ENTRUSTOR.NAME AS ENTRUSTOR_NAME, SF_ENTRUSTOR.ADDRESS AS ENTRUSTOR_ADDRESS, SF_ENTRUSTOR.ZIP AS ENTRUSTOR_ZIP, SF_ENTRUSTOR.LINK_MAN AS ENTRUSTOR_LINK_MAN, SF_ENTRUSTOR.LINK_TEL AS ENTRUSTOR_LINK_TEL, SF_JD_TARGET.NAME as JD_TARGET_NAME, SF_JD_TARGET.SEX as JD_TARGET_SEX, SF_JD_TARGET.AGE as JD_TARGET_AGE, SF_JD_TARGET.ID_NAME as JD_TARGET_ID_NAME, SF_JD_TARGET.ID_CODE as JD_TARGET_ID_CODE, SF_JD_TARGET.PHONE as JD_TARGET_PHONE, SF_JD_TARGET.ADDRESS as JD_TARGET_ADDRESS, SF_JD_TARGET.ZIP as JD_TARGET_ZIP, SF_JD_TARGET.JD_TARGET_ID from SF_ENTRUST, SF_ENTRUSTOR, SF_JD_TARGET WHERE SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUSTOR_ID = SF_ENTRUSTOR.ENTRUSTOR_ID AND SF_ENTRUST.JD_TARGET_ID = SF_JD_TARGET.JD_TARGET_ID(+)
SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID not in(select r.entrust_id from sf_receipt r where r.receipt_type='shouli')
SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID not in(select r.entrust_id from sf_receipt r where r.receipt_type='jujue')
not exists(select * from sf_materials_transfer t where t.entrust_id=SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID)
not exists(select * from SF_JD_RESULT t where t.entrust_id=SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID)
not exists(select * from SF_JD_DOC_AUDIT t where t.entrust_id=SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID)
not exists(select * from SF_DOSSIER t where t.entrust_id=SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID)
SF_ENTRUST.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_ENTRUST.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_ENTRUST.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = SF_ENTRUST.process_inst_id) and SF_ENTRUST.STATUS!= 'cancel' and SF_ENTRUST.STATUS != 'exec'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=SF_ENTRUST.process_inst_id) or SF_ENTRUST.process_inst_id = -1 ) and SF_ENTRUST.STATUS ='0'
(SF_ENTRUST.STATUS='exec')
1=1
order by SF_ENTRUST.ENTRUST_ID desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into SF_ENTRUST (ENTRUST_ID, CODE, NAME, STATUS, ENTRUSTOR_ID, WT_DATE, SJR, SJR_TEL, SJR_ZJ_TYPE, SJR_ZJ_CODE, MAJOR_CODE, JD_ORG, JD_FZR, JD_HISTORY, JD_REQUIRE, JD_COMPANY, REMARK, IS_CXJD, WT_ID_PARENT, BRIEF, INPUTOR, INPUT_DATE, ACCEPTOR, ACCEPT_DATE, IS_ACCEPT, NOT_ACCEPT_REASON, ND, JD_TARGET_ID,PROCESS_INST_ID) values (#entrustId:DECIMAL#, #code:VARCHAR#, #name:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #entrustorId:DECIMAL#, #wtDate:DATE#, #sjr:VARCHAR#, #sjrTel:VARCHAR#, #sjrZjType:VARCHAR#, #sjrZjCode:VARCHAR#, #majorCode:VARCHAR#, #jdOrg:VARCHAR#, #jdFzr:VARCHAR#, #jdHistory:VARCHAR#, #jdRequire:VARCHAR#, #jdCompany:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #isCxjd:VARCHAR#, #wtIdParent:DECIMAL#, #brief:VARCHAR#, #inputor:VARCHAR#, #inputDate:DATE#, #acceptor:VARCHAR#, #acceptDate:DATE#, #isAccept:VARCHAR#, #notAcceptReason:VARCHAR#, #nd:DECIMAL#, #jdTargetId:DECIMAL#,#processInstId:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update SF_ENTRUST set CODE = #code:VARCHAR#, NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#, ENTRUSTOR_ID = #entrustorId:DECIMAL#, WT_DATE = #wtDate:DATE#, SJR = #sjr:VARCHAR#, SJR_TEL = #sjrTel:VARCHAR#, SJR_ZJ_TYPE = #sjrZjType:VARCHAR#, SJR_ZJ_CODE = #sjrZjCode:VARCHAR#, MAJOR_CODE = #majorCode:VARCHAR#, JD_ORG = #jdOrg:VARCHAR#, JD_FZR = #jdFzr:VARCHAR#, JD_HISTORY = #jdHistory:VARCHAR#, JD_REQUIRE = #jdRequire:VARCHAR#, JD_COMPANY = #jdCompany:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, IS_CXJD = #isCxjd:VARCHAR#, WT_ID_PARENT = #wtIdParent:DECIMAL#, BRIEF = #brief:VARCHAR#, INPUTOR = #inputor:VARCHAR#, INPUT_DATE = #inputDate:DATE#, ACCEPTOR = #acceptor:VARCHAR#, ACCEPT_DATE = #acceptDate:DATE#, IS_ACCEPT = #isAccept:VARCHAR#, NOT_ACCEPT_REASON = #notAcceptReason:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:DECIMAL#, JD_TARGET_ID = #jdTargetId:DECIMAL#, PROCESS_INST_ID=#processInstId:DECIMAL# where ENTRUST_ID = #entrustId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
select USER_ID, COMPO_ID, FUNC_ID from v_sf_user_func where 1=1
USER_ID=#userId#
COMPO_ID=#compoId#
